item.title: Torrents
item.dc:creator: @mvp566 mvp566
item.description:
@mvp566 wrote:

[quote=“Ron”][center][size=20pt]How to get almost any program for FREE![/size]
by Ron[/center]

-> Just the Basics
I’m sure a lot of you know this, but even more of you don’t know about it. It’s called torrents. Torrents are files that let you download an exact match of the file you’re looking for from other people. Just like on KaZaA or something, but only EXACT ones will appear, so if anyone embedded any viruses, then you wouldn’t see that seeder. A seeder is someone who has the file and one you can download from.

Download BitTorrent. Install it, and get your butt back here. Also, I know there are different programs for downloading torrents, but BitTorrent is so easy and very small in size, that it’s perfect. If anyone wants to complicate things then download Azureus, BitLord, BitComet, or 10 other different torrent programs.

You got the program, now you need torrents. Where do you get torrents? Well there are many websites out there that carry them, but you only want to go to one, because 90% of the other websites that have torrents are infested with spyware and other junk, but feel free to try them by searching on google for torrents or whatever.

The website you want to get torrents from is called TorrentSpy.com or you could check out MiniNova.org and also Demonoid.com is very good. Just search for whatever you like such as photoshop, flash, etcetera. You will find it. When you download the torrent, make sure it has a lot of seeders so you can actually download it. BitTorrent is just like a P2P app, except torrents are much cleaner than individual files that you would get from KaZaA or Limewire.

-> Set up BitTorrent 4.20.4

[ul][] Open up BitTorrent and go to View > Settings
[] On the General Tab, I checked the first two and the fifth checkboxes.
[] On the Saving Tab, for the “Move Completed Downloads to” browse to a spot where you can store your torrents. Mine is C:\Ron\Torrents. If you’re paranoid that your parents may find out, then make sure to hide where you keep your torrents by making a folder like… C:\Windows\Important Documents. And for the “Store Unfinished Downloads In”, just leave it the way it is.
[] On the Network Tab, it should be set to “Autodetect available bandwidth” and for the “Look for an available port” just pick a random number from 1024-65535 and leave “Enable automatic port mapping (UPnP)” checked.
[] On the Appearance Tab, it’s confusing for me to see the bits and pieces instead of an Ordinary Progress Bar. On the Toolbar Style, I checked “Show Text” and chose Small for the Icon Size.
[] On the Language Tab, just pick whatever language you’re most comfortable with. :)[/ul]

WARNING! The torrents are not always clean and/or spyware free. Just be careful, and try to read people’s reviews, and see what they say. Normally the first poster will say if it worked or if its clean or not. Check what the others said to be absolutely sure.

WAIT! IF YOU HAVE/KNOW ANY GOOD PROGRAMS THAT REQUIRE A KEY OR SOME KIND OF HACK. PLEASE UPLOAD THEM AND THEN POST IT HERE. I’LL CREDIT YOU AND ADD THE PROGRAM. WE ONLY HAVE 20 SOMETHING PROGRAMS!! WE NEED MORE!!! Greed… :rolleyes:

-> Programs Predownloaded just for you
Some files are from torrents from TorrentSpy.com and some are serials from Serials.ws (which is spyware infected and it’s recommended that you do not go there). For each program, just follow the instructions to install it properly. Most of the time, the install information is in the below files.

For your sake please DO NOT register for any of the below programs.

[ul][][iurl=#alcohol]Alcohol 120%[/iurl]
[][iurl=#adaware]Ad-Aware Pro 1.0.6[/iurl]
[][iurl=#ps]Adobe Photoshop CS2[/iurl]
[][iurl=#ashampoo]Ashampoo Burning Studio 6.xx[/iurl]
[][iurl=#camtasia]Camtasia Studio 3.1[/iurl]
[][iurl=#vgs]Connectix VGS[/iurl]
[][iurl=#divx]DivX 6.x[/iurl]
[][iurl=#ip]Hide IP Platinum 2.4[/iurl]
[][iurl=#invision]Invision Board 2.1.4[/iurl]
[][iurl=#iolo]Iolo System Mechanic Professional[/iurl]
[][iurl=#limewire]Limewire Pro[/iurl]
[][iurl=#dw]Macromedia Dreamweaver 8[/iurl]
[][iurl=#flash]Macromedia Flash 8[/iurl]
[][iurl=#mc]McAfee Firewall[/iurl]
[][iurl=#mop2003]Microsoft Office Professional 2003[/iurl]
[][iurl=#nero]Nero 7.xxxxx[/iurl]
[][iurl=#partition]Partitioning Software[/iurl]

[][iurl=#winrar]WinRar 3[/iurl]
[*][iurl=#winzip]WinZip 10[/iurl][/ul]

But hey, if you need the extra features Nero supplies, then download it and have fun.
